info.title: TON API
info.description: API for interacting with The Open Network (TON) blockchain

get.description: Retrieves a list of blocks from the TON blockchain

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of blocks to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of blocks to skip before starting to return results

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The sorting order of the blocks

seqno.description: The sequence number of the block

shard.description: The shard identifier of the block

workchain.description: The workchain ID of the block

fileHash.description: The file hash of the block

rootHash.description: The root hash of the block
